description: Numbers n such that 70*R_n + 3, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (7*10^(n+1)-43)/9 is prime.a(18) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Nov 01 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 77...773.
